General.Name: Mechema Chemicals Int
General.Description: Mechema Chemicals International Corp. produces and sells oxidation catalysts equipment and technology worldwide. The company offers battery and catalyst materials; and cobalt and nickel related products. It also provides CTA waste catalyst recovery and PTA mother liquor systems. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1, Datong 1st Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 32849
